name: Blasteroids (itch) (Deozaan)
description:
Pew pew!

Originally created for DonationCoder's NANY 2014 challenge, Blasteroids is an arcade game similar to Asteroids, but rather than piloting a spaceship you control a point-defense turret instead.

Compete against yourself (and others) with a local high score table. The Android version optionally brings achievements, leaderboards, and cloud saves using your Google Play Games account.

How long can you survive?

Blasteroids official website.
